title: @maia/schema/os/runtimes-registry
description: Runtimes registry CoMap - vibe co-id -> colist of runtime assignments. Stored in spark.os.runtimes. Key = vibe co-id (not human-readable). Guardian assigns which accounts run each vibe.

additionalProperties.description: Vibe co-id -> CoList co-id of runtime assignments [{ browser: coId } | { server: coId }, ...]
